casebody.data:
WILKES COUNTY BOARD OF EDUCATION, Petitioner,
v.
DEPARTMENT OF STATE TREASURER, RETIREMENT SYSTEMS DIVISION; Dale R. Folwell, State Treasurer (in official capacity only); Steven C. Toole, Director, Retirement Systems Division (in official capacity only), Respondents. No. COA17-1020 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: September 18, 2018

AFFIRMED.
